nodes.text: Archons was a title held within the ancient Hutt Empire that designated officials who were both a cultist and a judge. These individuals were selected to enforce ancient Hutt practices as well as ensure the purity of their empire against any form of threat. In time, the Hutt Empire faded leading to the position similarly disappearing.

After the apparent death of the Sith Emperor, the Hutt Cartel saw an avenue to bring about the rise of a new Hutt Empire. It was in this setting that Szajin arose where he claimed the rank of First Archon of the New Hutt Empire as he sought to bring about the ascendance of his people.
